Page 1912
Re: Draft language
From Hugh Hurwitz
To Ray Ormond
Date 2019/08/12 06:27
Subject: Re: Draft language
Attachments: TEXT.htm
Cristina can help if needed too.
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: Ray Ormond [b6]; [b7c] @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 6:01 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz [b6]; [b7c] @bop.gov>
Subject: Re: Draft language
>>> "Ray Ormond" 08/12/2019 06:01 >>>
Will do.
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: Hugh Hurwitz [b6]; [b7c] @bop.gov>
Date: 8/12/19 5:31 AM (GMT-05:00)
To: Ray Ormond [b6]; @bop.gov>
Subject: Fwd: Draft language
>>> "Hugh Hurwitz" 08/12/2019 05:31 >>>
In addition to details on those two staff, please pull total staffing info, number vacancies, AWOL, long term leave, etc. Also, status of curr
Hugh
Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone
------- Original message -------
From: [b6]; [b7c] (OAG) *[b6]; [b7c] @usdoj.gov>
Date: 8/11/19 11:12 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: Hugh Hurwitz [b6]; [b7c] @bop.gov>
Cc: Ray Ormond [b6]; @bop.gov>
Subject: RE: Draft language
>>> "[b6]; [b7c] (OAG)" 08/11/2019 23:12 >>>
Thanks. This is helpful. We can talk tomorrow about the timing.
It will also be helpful to get some information about staffing at MCC I've seen additional press reports trying to link the staffing shortages, overtime and
Thanks,
[b6]; [b7c]
From: Hugh Hurwitz [b6]; [b7c] @bop.gov>
Sent: Sunday, August 11, 2019 9:53 PM
To [b6]; [b7c] (OAG) [b6]; @usdoj.gov>
Cc: Ray Ormond [b6]; @bop.gov>
Subject: Draft language
[b6]; as discussed, several options are below. Please note that we should discuss timing of all this. I will need to ensure staff are notified first, and I shoul [b6]; [b7c]
[b6]; [b7c]
DOJ-OGR-00025880

additional_notes: The document is an email chain with redactions. The content appears to be related to staffing information and draft language. The document quality is good, but there are redactions throughout the text.
